needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: There is no straightforward answer to the question of what makes a good essay, but it can be broken down into three main components: correctness, novelty, and strength. A good essay should be correct, with no room for errors or ambiguities. It should also be novel, introducing new ideas and perspectives that add to the reader's understanding. Additionally, the essay should be strong, using the techniques of persuasive writing to make a compelling argument.One of the most important factors in writing a good essay is correctness. It refers to the accuracy and precision of the information provided, the clarity of the writing, and the completeness of the arguments presented. A correct essay should have no grammatical errors, no ambiguities or ambiguating words, and no fallacies or logical fallacies.An essay that is correct will also be thorough and complete. It should cover all the necessary points and provide enough evidence to support its arguments, without being too verbose or lengthy. A good essay should also be well-organized and have a clear structure, with an introduction, body, and conclusion that flow smoothly into one another. Noveltiness is another key element of a good essay. It refers to the originality and uniqueness of the ideas presented, as well as the fresh perspective and insights provided. A novel essay should introduce new concepts, challenge existing beliefs, and offer new perspectives on a given topic.It's not always easy to make your essay novel, but it's essential to strive for it. One way to achieve this is to look for new angles and perspectives that challenge conventional thinking. You can also use vivid imagery and creative language to make your essay more engaging and memorable.Another important aspect of a good essay is strength. This refers to the ability of the essay to persuade the reader of the writer's point of view. A strong essay should have a clear and compelling thesis statement, well-supported arguments, and effective transitions between paragraphs.A good essay should also demonstrate the writer's passion and conviction, as well as their ability to organize and express their thoughts in a clear and concise manner. The essay should be free of filler words and phrases, and should use active voice instead of passive voice. Additionally, the essay should be well-edited and free of grammatical errors.To achieve strength in your essay, you should carefully research and evaluate your sources, and organize your ideas in a logical and coherent manner. You should also use rhetorical devices such as metaphors, similes, and allusions to add depth and complexity to your essay.Add
